about_the_game:
In the year 3012 A.D., Earth is barely surviving. A decade has passed since an iron-based comet tore through our planet, obliterating over 70% of life.

During an expedition, a team of prospectors discovers an enigmatic signal emanating from within a hollow asteroid. They uncover an ancient alien artifact, glowing with an otherworldly light. Upon contact, they are abruptly teleported to an alternate dimension.

Stricken with amnesia and scattered, the crew is captured and enslaved on a sinister AI-controlled mining barge. Forced to mine asteroids in mech suits, they must collect resources, craft tools, and devise an escape plan.

Spoiler Alert Flashbacks reveal a vibrant Earth of the past and a glimpse of advanced Gaia. Memories of a young girl, eerily similar to a long-lost sister, piloting a mech suit to carry her injured grandfather up a mountain surface. The protagonist must escape the prison, repay their debt as a slave miner, and seek answers about this alien realm. The ultimate goal? To retrieve the alien artifact and return home.

Upon escaping the barge, the quest to recover the alien artifact begins. This time-altering device could potentially revert the comet’s devastating impact on Earth.

Immerse yourself in a survival simulation as a prisoner forced into space flight and asteroid mining. Explore a procedurally generated open world with fully destructible environments governed by Newtonian physics in this space flight sim and psychological survival horror game.

Game Features

First-person, Survival Psychological Horror, Adventure, Immersive Space Mining Flight Simulator with JRPG-inspired elements
Episodic content including rescue, repair, racing, and archaeological missions (EP1 currently in Early Access)
Character-driven, Singleplayer story-focused for Episode one (Multiplayer coming in future episodes)
Psychological Survival Horror mixed with Anime-style Quest and RPG elements
Explore, Expedition, Prospect, Mine, Rescue, Repair, Survey, Salvage, Scavenge, Survive
Outwit or fight Pirates, various aliens, rival asteroid miners, and Overlords
Procedural Generated near infinite “Open World Multiverse”
Expansive, and growing organic procedurally generated, fully destructible environments
Fully Destructible Environments, mine asteroids and collect minerals to trade or have crafted
Trade with merchant ships, while avoiding hostile raiders and rival mining corporations
Find tools and have them crafted to escape the prison
Component and Systems damage, oxygen, water, fuel are only some of the systems set in play for survival in an immersive simulation
Science-based GeoPhysics inspired by Thermodynamics and Aeronautics, Simulated Newtonian Physics based on Real factual science simulations
VR Oculus Rift and HOTAS/Gamepad Support (Vive HMD support coming soon)
Community driven receives points and rewards for finding bugs and coming up with new ideas
Can you outsmart your captors and escape the prison of forced space mining? Find freedom, build a mining fleet, and strive to become the wealthiest Space Mining Jockey in the Universe!

Step into the shoes of an everyday Deep Space Asteroid Miner, enslaved to mine asteroids for valuable resources under the watchful eye of an advanced alien A.I.-controlled mega-mining corporation, A.R.M.

As the Andromeda Galaxy is set on a collision course with the Milky Way, hope seems lost. Can a group of unlikely heroes from diverse species set aside their differences, harness their unique strengths, defy fate, and overcome destiny? Your mission is to escape the mining prison barge and save your family!

Experience a hands-on futuristic space mining simulation in a gameplay-focused, character-driven first-person VR and non-VR immersion. Set in an episodic universe centered around unlikely heroes from diverse origins, you play the role of a vulnerable space miner trapped as a prisoner aboard a mining barge converted into a prison for asteroid miners. Wake up, mine, explore and use your wits and skills to escape the barge and find your family.

As an enslaved Asteroid Miner, you can either work to pay off your debt or devise clever means to escape the malevolent AI overlords orbiting Earth.

Episode One EARLY ACCESS Our graphics and gameplay are subject to change as we are still in EARLY ACCESS. We reward our community for making suggestions and finding bugs. We are an indie team, and some of us working part-time until we secure more funding from our upcoming Kickstarter. nDiG is committed to this series and will continue to build for years to come, even if development slows down and we have to source work from the community. Your support is greatly appreciated and will keep ARM in Early Access until it is ready to LAUNCH! Episode ONE is expected for Fall 2022. Join the community and make a real impact!

If you encounter any difficulties or have suggestions for the game, PLEASE reach out and report it to us before leaving negative comments. We value every review and are actively investigating fixes to address any negative reviews. We aim to work with you to make ARM a memorable and amazing game that players will appreciate for generations to come.

ARM PLANETARY PROSPECTORS EP1 is still in EARLY ACCESS and subject to change. We are using this time to make improvements and iterations to the design, art, story, tech, and performance. Once the pilot episode 1 meets our quality standards, we will continue with future episodic content. This game is not abandoned or vaporware. We are a small indie team, some of us balancing full-time jobs in the game and other industries. We ask for your PATIENCE and THANK YOU for your SUPPORT.

Stay tuned for some big announcements regarding our breakthrough in improving the voxel destruction tech!
detailed_description:
Buzz

We are still in Early Access and will be updating and adding features, fixing bugs, and tuning the gameplay. We listen to our community and value their opinions. NDiG's goal is to provide the most fun and exhilarating Space Exploration, Mining Psychological Survival Horror game on the market. Then eventually port to Sony PlayStation 5 and Microsoft Xbox X.


About the Game

In the year 3012 A.D., Earth is barely surviving. A decade has passed since an iron-based comet tore through our planet, obliterating over 70% of life.

legal_notice:
© 2015 ARM Planetary Prospectors Asteroid Resource Mining Copyright Nefarious Dimensions Inc.

From purchasing ARM Planetary Prospectors from Steam, means all ownership and rights remains and belongs to Nefarious Dimensions. In exchange Nefarious Dimensions Inc. grants exclusive membership to our Steam Early Access, allowing that community member to provide feedback and suggestions on the unfinished Early Access game ARM Planetary Prospectors. This Exclusive membership is for the Account that purchased ARM Planetary Prospectors on Steam. By Purchasing, means only to gain access to Nefarious Dimensions Inc. Asteroid Mining Members Only section. Early Access adopters will then be the first to have access to the Final complete game of ARM Planetary Prospectors. The Revenue generated from the Steam Early Access, are being used to make more improvements on the game. Sales of this product are for exclusive Early Access Membership.

Early Access, Not yet Final design or content, subject matter, and content may change before completion and final release. Additional updates and support may be available post launch. This membership Inclusive access to the Final version of ARM Planetary Prospectors and Early Access to the sequel ARM PP:EP2

Purchase is for Exclusive Early Access Membership (No Commerical License available until game is complete final and released)

Bonus for Early Access adapters, additional Steam Keys and Access for ARM Planetary Prospectors and ARM Planetary Prospectors Episode 2 Early Access.

Current versions of ARM Planetary Prospectors is experimental, and not yet ready for commercial release. Our feedback from our Community will help shape and deliever quality.

You shall not, without Nefarious Dimension’s express written consent: to copy, distribute, modify, adapt, translate, reverse engineer, derive source code from, disassemble, decompile or create derivative works based on the Software Product

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5.6
  • Processor: 2.26GHz Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated DX 11 Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5.6
  • Processor: 2.2.26GHz Intel Quad Core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core Duo 2.20 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB video card Dedicated DX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: generic
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3.60 GHz or equalivant
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB video card Dedicated DX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: generic
  • Additional Notes: The better the GPU, the more intense the procedural generation will be

short_description: During an expedition, prospectors discover an alien artifact inside an asteroid. Upon contact, they’re teleported to another realm. Captured and enslaved on a mining barge, they mine asteroids in mech suits, all while devising an escape plan to freedom.
